learn_quest_log.name: Logging Your Adventures
learn_quest_log.description: This is your personal quest journal! I know you like keeping things organized, so it's divided into three sections: Quests, Steps, and Hints. This is the Quest section, which gives you a general overview of what you need to do. Press 'Tab' to head to the 'Steps' section.

assure_eraton.name: The Quest to Assure Eraton
assure_eraton.description: You already have permission to leave, but doing this before you go will keep your king's mind at ease.

look_at_quest_log.name: Learn to Use This Journal
look_at_quest_log.description: Eraton gave you a journal to record your journey and your quests in.

get_dressed.name: Dress to Impress
get_dressed.description: Your king wishes to see you properly clothed before anything else. ...Honestly, you're lucky he's so fond of you. Walking out like you just woke up and requesting the boon of a journey across the kingdom? He would've been right to lock you away in the crazy house.

train_weapons.name: Melee Management
train_weapons.description: Your king asked you to show competence in the art of melee weaponry.

train_magic.name: Miracle Study
train_magic.description: Your king has asked you to show competence in the art of miracles. No matter how you go about your journey, miracles will inevitably be of great import, so grasping the fundaments is as well.

fake_harem_wall.name: False Wall
fake_harem_wall.description: There's a false wall on the north side of your king's chambers. You can simply walk through it to get to your personal bedroom in the Phitemos, and your wardrobe within.

train_weapons.name: Training Grounds
train_weapons.description: You'll find the training grounds past the castle's north entrance. --n You spent some time training with conventional weaponry when you first decided to take on this quest. It... didn't go well, but the master-at-arms, Sergeant Caballera, respects your tenacity... you think.

train_magic.name: Temple
train_magic.description: You'll find the Temple of Prometus past the castle's south entrance. --n You could also get Dmitri to bring you up to the Archmage's lab, but... maybe it's better to start at the Temple.

kesvelt_jin_shi_dies.name: Burnt Disciple
kesvelt_jin_shi_dies.description: There's been an accident. You saw a young Lingin woman named Mei-Hua mourning a burnt corpse just east of the south entrance.

visit_imedes.name: Tell the Archmage
visit_imedes.description: Bubba Renald told you in the most diplomatic way he could to kick rocks. Nothing you're not used to, and at least this time you were told that to protect someone else. He's right about giving a heads up to the Archmage. Better ask Bubba Dmitri to take you to his lab.

kesvelt_fake_books.name: Mystery of the Burning Disciples
kesvelt_fake_books.description: According to Archmage Imedes, several disciples of Prometus have burned themselves alive while casting miracles, recently. He doesn't buy the monks' excuses that it's just carelessness that leads to these tragedies, but he's too busy with his research to look into it himself without a solid lead. You aren't an investigator, but maybe if you solve this mystery, Imedes will find time for it, and you, as a show of thanks.

visit_morgue.name: Visit the Morgue
visit_morgue.description: Archmage Imedes recommended you visit the morgue to see if you can find any clues. Well, he didn't actually say anything about clues, he just wanted you to leave.

poor_only.name: Only Low-Class Casualties
poor_only.description: So far, none of the nobles posturing as disciples have fallen victim to this seeming epidemic of self-immolation.

recent_casualty.name: Another Victim
recent_casualty.description: There's been an accident. You saw a young Lingin woman named Mei-Hua mourning a burnt corpse just east of the south entrance.

earn_favor.name: Earn Favor
earn_favor.description: Travel about Sewinso and earn the favor of the Eight.
